directions: Stir the black-eyed peas, green onions, sugar, olive oil, garlic, tomatoes, cilantro, balsamic vinegar,  and salt together in a mixing bowl. Mix in jalapeno peppers, if desired. Cover, and refrigerate at least six hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
title: Black-Eyed Pea Dip
